# The `Argument` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A key-value pair with a debug location that is used to display the remarks at the right place in the source. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A key-value pair with a debug location that is used to display the remarks at the right place in the source.
